name: Bayanihan Community Center
description: Bayanihan Community Center (BCC) offers services to low-income families, students, youth, immigrant workers, and seniors in San Francisco and have access to aid for shelter, personal protective equipment, and other needs as they arise. Services include: - Food assistance - Case management - Wellness checks - Navigating unemployment benefits
